sentences.sContent: Carol was very excited that I was interested in our family's history, even if it was just because a former sitcom actress told me to be.
sentences.sCn: 卡萝尔见到我开始对我们家的历史感兴趣，当然非常兴奋。 即使这只是因为我被前情景喜剧里的女演员逼着做的。

sentences.sContent: Examples of this would be a half-hour sitcom, a one-hour drama, an episodic documentary, a how-to program such as cooking or home repair or a reality show.
sentences.sCn: 包括半小时的情景喜剧，一小时的剧情片，一部插话式的纪录片，一个诸如烹饪或家居修补或真人秀的指引类节目。

trans.tranOther: a funny television programme in which the same characters appear in different situations each week
